plot: Sentry, a 19 year old orphan has a secret. He's extremely gifted and mad at the world. Will anyone listen?
title: The Smile of an Angry Man

original_name: The Smile of an Angry Man
plot_en: Sentry, a 19 year old orphan has a secret. He's extremely gifted and mad at the world. Will anyone listen?
